_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: KeeperJerry Mirror Launcher
author: alexxxlyt@yandex.ru
description: Форк кастомного лаунчера sashok724 от KeeperJerry.

installation.script:
#!/bin/sh
apk update
apk add curl
apk add tar

cd /mnt/server

set -e

readonly DOWNLOAD_URL="http://mirror.keeperjerry.ru/launcher/v1/"
readonly LIBRARIES_DIR="libraries"
readonly UPDATES_DIR="updates"
readonly JRE_VERSION="8u131"

# Create dirs
mkdir -p $LIBRARIES_DIR $LIBRARIES_DIR/hikaricp $UPDATES_DIR

# Download LaunchServer
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading LaunchServer.jar"
curl -o LaunchServer.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/LaunchServer.jar

# Download JAnsi
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading JAnsi (Colored console support)"
if [ ! -f $LIBRARIES_DIR/jansi.jar ]; then
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/jansi.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/jansi.jar
fi

# Download JLine2
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading JLine2 (Better console support)"
if [ ! -f $LIBRARIES_DIR/jline2.jar ]; then
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/jline2.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/jline2.jar
fi

# Download HikariCP
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading HikariCP (JDBC connection pooling)"
if [ ! -f $LIBRARIES_DIR/hikaricp/hikaricp.jar ]; then
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/hikaricp/hikaricp.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/hikaricp/hikaricp.jar
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/hikaricp/javassist.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/hikaricp/javassist.jar
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/hikaricp/slf4j-api.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/hikaricp/slf4j-api.jar
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/hikaricp/slf4j-simple.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/hikaricp/slf4j-simple.jar
fi

# Download BCrypt
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading BCrypt for MySQL Connector (Authentication support)"
if [ ! -f $LIBRARIES_DIR/jbcrypt.jar ]; then
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/jbcrypt.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/jbcrypt.jar
fi

# Download MySQL
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading MySQL Connector (Authentication support)"
if [ ! -f $LIBRARIES_DIR/mysql.jar ]; then
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/mysql.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/mysql.jar
fi

# Download MySQL-8
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading MySQL-8 Connector (Authentication support)"
if [ ! -f $LIBRARIES_DIR/mysql-8.jar ]; then
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/mysql-8.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/mysql-8.jar
fi

# Download MariaDB
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading MariaDB Connector (Authentication support)"
if [ ! -f $LIBRARIES_DIR/mariadb.jar ]; then
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/mariadb.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/mariadb.jar
fi

# Download PostgreSQL
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading PostgreSQL Connector (Authentication support)"
if [ ! -f $LIBRARIES_DIR/postgresql.jar ]; then
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/postgresql.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/postgresql.jar
fi

# Download SQLite
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading SQLite Connector (Authentication support)"
if [ ! -f $LIBRARIES_DIR/sqlite.jar ]; then
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/sqlite.jar $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/sqlite.jar
fi

# Download Launch4J
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading Launch4J (EXE binary building support)"
if [ ! -d $LIBRARIES_DIR/launch4j ]; then
	curl -o $LIBRARIES_DIR/launch4j.tar.gz $DOWNLOAD_URL/$LIBRARIES_DIR/launch4j.tar.gz
	tar -xf $LIBRARIES_DIR/launch4j.tar.gz -C $LIBRARIES_DIR
	chmod -R +x $LIBRARIES_DIR/launch4j/bin
	rm $LIBRARIES_DIR/launch4j.tar.gz
fi

# Download JVMs
echo "[KeeperJerry]: Downloading Java $JRE_VERSION JVMs (Universal Bypass protection)"
if [ ! -d $UPDATES_DIR/jre-$JRE_VERSION-win32 ] || [ ! -d $UPDATES_DIR/jre-$JRE_VERSION-win64 ] || [ ! -d $UPDATES_DIR/jre-$JRE_VERSION-linux32 ] || [ ! -d $UPDATES_DIR/jre-$JRE_VERSION-linux64 ] || [ ! -d $UPDATES_DIR/jre-$JRE_VERSION-macosx ]; then
	curl -o $UPDATES_DIR/jre.tar.gz $DOWNLOAD_URL/java/jre-$JRE_VERSION.tar.gz
	tar --warning=no-unknown-keyword -xf $UPDATES_DIR/jre.tar.gz -C $UPDATES_DIR
	rm $UPDATES_DIR/jre.tar.gz
fi

chmod -R 755 $LIBRARIES_DIR/launch4j

# Ready to use!
echo "Ready to use!"
